thread.section_title: KISA Phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA Phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Meredith Bailey
thread.title_full: KISA Phone reviewed by Meredith Bailey

author: Meredith Bailey
title: Meredith Bailey
text:
Just two small improvements I'd like to have. I've sometimes picked up the phone and pushed a call button accidentally, maybe you could make it so you push the call button twice? Also, if you missed a call, you don't know who has tried to call you (I don't have a suggestion for this one). Apart from these small points I have found the phone to be excellent.
Thanks KISA - I knew you were good. Since I wrote my review yesterday you have modified my phone to a two button caller.
